--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron's Hologram:
> 
> "I thought the same several years ago... Cyclonus, we should care 
> from lesser enemies as well as bigger. Dont' forget it" Said 
> Unicron's Hologran who added " HE must die as well as she "A new 
> hologram appeared, it was Blacknightmare, a former minion" She must 
> pay her treason..." 

"I will not forget it." Cyclonus nodded once, accepting the rebuke from
Unicron. He looked over at the image, "Where was Blacknightmare last
seen, what was her mission and function?" Cyclonus paused thoughtfully
and then continued, "and what capabilities does she possess?"

Preston
(Cyclonus)
